Package it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUIpackage

Class PlayPanel.DragAndDrop

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.swing.TransferHandler
      • it.polimi.ingsw.view.GUIpackage.PlayPanel.DragAndDrop
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    PlayPanel
    protected class PlayPanel.DragAndDrop
extends javax.swing.TransferHandler
    The type Drag and drop. Extends Transfer Handler to support drag and drop of an TransferableImage object.
